issue.title: [C++] Use same CC and AR for jemalloc as for the main sources
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4191](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4191). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
jemalloc currently does its own CC and AR detection and sometimes comes to different conclusions. This let to linking errors for the static library for me.
